$WmMPID_エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Normal,Face|Ready when you are. Sigurd, Quan,
you need only say the word.$k$p$WmMPID_キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Normal,Face|Ready! Though I feel transported
to days past, back to our time at
the academy in Belhalla...$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|Well, after battle, we must sit and
tell stories—just like back then.
For now, let's begin, shall we?$k$p
